flavorText: The thick, moving mass from the beginning of evolution swallows and digests the animate and inanimate as it unthinkingly strives to continue its existence.
name: Primordial Ooze
originalText: Must attack each turn if possible. Gains +1/+1 at end of your upkeep. Use counters. Then pay o1 per counter or Ooze deals 1 damage to you for each counter and becomes tapped.

rulings.text: It becomes tapped even if the damage is prevented.

text:
Primordial Ooze attacks each combat if able.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Primordial Ooze. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap Primordial Ooze and it deals X damage to you.
